item.title: JamaateIslami among others reject Al Qaeda plan
item.description: Prominent Muslim organisations have rejected Al Qaedas announcement of its new establishment in South Asia saying Indian Muslims will not be swayed by its ideology
item.itunes:subtitle: Prominent Muslim organisations have rejected Al Qaedas announcement of its new establishment in South Asia saying Indian Muslims will not be swayed by its ideology
item.itunes:summary: Prominent Muslim organisations have rejected Al Qaedas announcement of its new establishment in South Asia saying Indian Muslims will not be swayed by its ideology

item.title: BJP falls back on Modi wave for assembly polls
item.description: The BJP will fall back on its most trusted face Prime Minister Narendra Modi to win the assembly election in four states Haryana Maharashtra Jharkhand and Jammu amp Kashmir will go to poll soon and the party has decided not to project a face in these states
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJP will fall back on its most trusted face Prime Minister Narendra Modi to win the assembly election in four states Haryana Maharashtra Jharkhand and Jammu amp Kashmir will go to poll soon and the party has decided not to project a face in these stat
item.itunes:summary: The BJP will fall back on its most trusted face Prime Minister Narendra Modi to win the assembly election in four states Haryana Maharashtra Jharkhand and Jammu amp Kashmir will go to poll soon and the party has decided not to project a face in these states

item.title: Madras high court gives relief to Marans
item.description: The Maran brothers former Union Minister Dayanidhi Maran and Kalanidhi Maran got a reprieve from the Madras High Court on Friday The court set aside the information and broadcasting ministrys order cancelling their companys licence to run a cable TV business
item.itunes:subtitle: The Maran brothers former Union Minister Dayanidhi Maran and Kalanidhi Maran got a reprieve from the Madras High Court on Friday The court set aside the information and broadcasting ministrys order cancelling their companys licence to run a cable TV busin
item.itunes:summary: The Maran brothers former Union Minister Dayanidhi Maran and Kalanidhi Maran got a reprieve from the Madras High Court on Friday The court set aside the information and broadcasting ministrys order cancelling their companys licence to run a cable TV business

item.title: SC orders release of undertrials who have served half their term
item.description: The Supreme Court on Friday ordered that overcrowded prisons be freed of all undertrials who have served half their maximum term setting in motion a process that could be a major step towards reforming the criminal justice system

item.title: Bangalore bail plea of rail ministers son reserved
item.description: The sessions court in Bangalore on Friday reserved for Saturday its order on the anticipatory bail plea of Railway Minister D V Sadananda Gowdas son in connection with a complaint of rape and cheating filed against him by a Kannada starlet

item.title: PM address Education channel lets down Kerala students
item.description: A staterun educational TV channel in Congressruled Kerala failed to air Narendra Modis Teachers Day address triggering a controversy While the BJP called it a deliberate move channel executives said there was a technical snag
item.itunes:subtitle: A staterun educational TV channel in Congressruled Kerala failed to air Narendra Modis Teachers Day address triggering a controversy While the BJP called it a deliberate move channel executives said there was a technical snag
item.itunes:summary: A staterun educational TV channel in Congressruled Kerala failed to air Narendra Modis Teachers Day address triggering a controversy While the BJP called it a deliberate move channel executives said there was a technical snag

item.title: Over 29000 complaints of crimes against women in last 3 years NHRC
item.description: Since January 2011 the NHRC has received over 29 000 complaints of crimes against women in the last three years and the number continues to grow NHRC Chairperson KG Balakrishnan expressed his dismay at the Despite very strict laws to curb crimes against women violations of womens human rights and sexual assault cases continue to be a major point of concern

item.title: Modi interacts with students on Teachers Day stresses on girl education
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed students across the nation on the occasion of Teachers Day On Twitter Modi said we salute all the teachers Live blog inside Vote Rate PM Modis interaction with students on a scale of 1 to 5
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed students across the nation on the occasion of Teachers Day On Twitter Modi said we salute all the teachers Live blog inside Vote Rate PM Modis interaction with students on a scale of 1 to 5
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed students across the nation on the occasion of Teachers Day On Twitter Modi said we salute all the teachers Live blog inside Vote Rate PM Modis interaction with students on a scale of 1 to 5

item.title: Kanpur student commits suicide after ragging
item.description: 22yearold Himanshu Vishwakarma a student of mechanical engineering at Government Polytechnic College in Kanpur committed suicide in his hostel room on September 3 after being ragged and beaten up by his seniors superintendent of police rural A K Mishra said

item.title: Nithari killer kept in high security Meerut jail
item.description: Nithari serial killer Surendra Koliwho is to be hanged here on September 12 has been placed in a highsecurity barrack in Meerut jail prison authorities said
item.itunes:subtitle: Nithari serial killer Surendra Koliwho is to be hanged here on September 12 has been placed in a highsecurity barrack in Meerut jail prison authorities said
item.itunes:summary: Nithari serial killer Surendra Koliwho is to be hanged here on September 12 has been placed in a highsecurity barrack in Meerut jail prison authorities said

item.title: Thane 14monthold beaten to death by mother lover
item.description: A 14monthold girl Zorabanu Abdul Kayyum was allegedly killed by her mother and her lover who was also married to the childs grandmother in Bhiwandi
item.itunes:subtitle: A 14monthold girl Zorabanu Abdul Kayyum was allegedly killed by her mother and her lover who was also married to the childs grandmother in Bhiwandi
item.itunes:summary: A 14monthold girl Zorabanu Abdul Kayyum was allegedly killed by her mother and her lover who was also married to the childs grandmother in Bhiwandi

item.title: Thane Four youths killed in road accident
item.description: The police suspect it was a hitandrun case and have registered a case against an unidentified person However they are yet to ascertain the sequence of events
item.itunes:subtitle: The police suspect it was a hitandrun case and have registered a case against an unidentified person However they are yet to ascertain the sequence of events
item.itunes:summary: The police suspect it was a hitandrun case and have registered a case against an unidentified person However they are yet to ascertain the sequence of events

item.title: Petition in HC challenging Modis election deferred to Oct 31
item.description: The Allahabad High Courtnbspon Fridaynbspdeferred till October 31 hearing on a petition challenging the election of Prime Minister Narendra Modi from the Varanasi Lok Sabha constituency
item.itunes:subtitle: The Allahabad High Courtnbspon Fridaynbspdeferred till October 31 hearing on a petition challenging the election of Prime Minister Narendra Modi from the Varanasi Lok Sabha constituency
item.itunes:summary: The Allahabad High Courtnbspon Fridaynbspdeferred till October 31 hearing on a petition challenging the election of Prime Minister Narendra Modi from the Varanasi Lok Sabha constituency

item.title: Rape charges will attract people to the party Jalpaiguri TMC leader
item.description: In the wake of accusations against the Trinamool Congress over the alleged gangrape and murder of a girl in West Bengal a ruling party leader on Friday claimed such accusations will only bolster the party membership
item.itunes:subtitle: In the wake of accusations against the Trinamool Congress over the alleged gangrape and murder of a girl in West Bengal a ruling party leader on Friday claimed such accusations will only bolster the party membership
item.itunes:summary: In the wake of accusations against the Trinamool Congress over the alleged gangrape and murder of a girl in West Bengal a ruling party leader on Friday claimed such accusations will only bolster the party membership

item.title: Kerala district collector shows the way to physical fitness
item.description: At least once a week collector Ajit Kumar will be walking down from his official residence to the place of work five kms awaynbspHe has also requested all his officers who are staying in the 5 km radius of the collectorate to dump their vehicles and set a standard
item.itunes:subtitle: At least once a week collector Ajit Kumar will be walking down from his official residence to the place of work five kms awaynbspHe has also requested all his officers who are staying in the 5 km radius of the collectorate to dump their vehicles and set a
